text: Being There is a 1979 American comedy-drama film with satirical elements. It stars Peter Sellers, Shirley MacLaine, and Melvyn Douglas, and was directed by Hal Ashby. The movie is based on the 1970 novel Being There by Jerzy Kosi≈Ñski, who co-wrote the screenplay with Robert C. Jones (uncredited). The supporting cast includes Jack Warden, Richard Dysart, and Richard Basehart. ==References== Category:American comedy-drama movies
title: Being There
